Class DataConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.networking.DataConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkDataSource, java.lang.Runnable

    class DataConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
implements NetworkDataSource
    This class listens for udp packets containing SensorData objects, and notifies a listener of new data. The listener must be
